I'm a small kid with a huge dream.
You could say I'm a bit different than most people.
I think trampolines are like the best thing ever created.
I'm still a kid at heart.
If you put a bag of candy in my hands, I just won't be able to control myself.
I think I'm cool but really, I'm not.
Surprisingly, I can actually do some cool flips.
For me, making videos is a passion, not a hobby.
I'm about 99% sure I have ADD.
Oh! Did I mention I love trampolines?
Like it or hate it, this is who I am.
